title: Antigravity IDE
description: An advanced agentic coding assistant designed by Google Deepmind to solve complex engineering tasks.
content: Antigravity is a powerful AI agent IDE that pairs with developers to build, debug, and refine software. It integrates deeply with your local environment to plan, execute, and verify complex coding workflows autonomously. Google Antigravity is currently free for individual developers during its public preview, offering unlimited AI-powered coding features, tab completions, and access to models like Gemini 3 Pro, but this is a temporary preview, and future enterprise or heavy usage might involve costs.

title: Amazon Web Services
description: The world's most comprehensive cloud platform, offering a 12-month free tier and always-free services like Lambda and DynamoDB.
content:
Why It's Great

AWS is the industry leader in cloud computing. Its free tier is split into "Always Free" and "12 Months Free," allowing developers to build and scale serious applications without cost initially.

Key Free Tier Features

üíª Compute

  • EC2: 750 hours/month of t2.micro or t3.micro instances (12 months).
  • Lambda: 1 million free requests/month & 3.2M seconds of compute time (Always Free).
  • Elastic Load Balancing: 750 hours/month (12 months).

üóÑÔ∏è Storage & Database

  • S3: 5GB standard storage (12 months).
  • DynamoDB: 25GB NoSQL DB storage (Always Free).
  • RDS: 750 hours/month of db.t2.micro, db.t3.micro, or db.t4g.micro (12 months).

üîß Utilities

  • CloudFront: 1TB data transfer out per month.
  • SNS/SQS: 1 million requests/month each.
  • CodeBuild: 100 build minutes/month.

Limitations

  • EC2 and RDS free tiers expire after 12 months.
  • Watch out for egress costs if you exceed the free allowances.

title: Microsoft Azure
description: A cloud computing service created by Microsoft, offering free services for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications.
content:
Why It's Great

Azure is deeply integrated with the Microsoft ecosystem (VS Code, GitHub). Its "Always Free" services include powerful serverless functions and app hosting capabilities.

Key Free Tier Features

üíª Compute & Apps

  • Virtual Machines: 750 hours/month of B1s burstable VMs (Linux & Windows) (12 months).
  • App Service: 10 web, mobile, or API apps (Always Free - F1 Free Tier).
  • Azure Functions: 1 million requests/month (Always Free).
  • Static Web Apps: Free SSL, custom domains, and global hosting.

üóÑÔ∏è Storage & Data

  • Cosmos DB: 1000 Request Units/sec and 25GB storage (Always Free).
  • Blob Storage: 5GB LRS hot block storage (12 months).
  • Bandwidth: 15GB data transfer out (12 months).

üß† AI & DevOps

  • Azure DevOps: 5 active users, unlimited private Git repos.
  • Cognitive Services: Free tiers for Computer Vision, Translator, Face, etc.
  • Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS): Free cluster management.

Limitations

  • VM free tier expires after 12 months.
  • "Always Free" applies to specific service tiers/SKUs only.

title: cron-job.org
description: Free external cron job service. Perfect for keeping free-tier services alive.
content:
Overview

cron-job.org is a free service that allows you to execute scheduled tasks (cron jobs) via HTTP requests. It's an essential tool for developers who need reliable scheduling without managing their own server infrastructure.

[!TIP] Prevent App Sleeping: Many free hosting providers (like Render, Glitch, or Replit) put your app to "sleep" after 15 minutes of inactivity. You can use cron-job.org to send a request to your app every 10 minutes, ensuring it stays active and responsive 24/7.

Key Features

  • High Frequency: Execute jobs up to 60x/hour (once per minute).
  • Versatile Scheduling: Use pre-defined intervals or typical cron syntax.
  • Execution Prediction: Preview upcoming run times.
  • Detailed History: View timing and response data for past executions.
  • Custom Requests: Configure HTTP methods (GET, POST, etc.), headers, and body data.
  • Test Runs: Immediate verification of job configuration.
  • Status Notifications: Alerts for job failures or recoveries.
  • Status Pages & Badges: Monitor and display service uptime.
  • Security: Supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) and YubiKey.
  • API: Manage jobs programmatically via REST API.
  • Eco-Friendly: Runs on 100% CO‚ÇÇ-neutral hydropower.
  • Open Source: GPL-licensed source code available on GitHub.
  • 100% Free: Supported entirely by donations.

title: Design Arena
description: An AI-powered platform for generating and comparing UI and design concepts.
content: Design Arena helps designers and developers explore multiple AI-generated design directions efficiently.

title: DEV Community
description: A vibrant, open-source community for software developers to share knowledge, write articles, and grow their careers.
content:
Why It's Great

DEV (dev.to) is one of the most inclusive and active communities for developers. Unlike Medium or other general blogging platforms, it is built by developers for developers, with a strong focus on code sharing, mentorship, and open exchange of ideas.

Key Features

ü§ù Community & Connection

  • Connect: finding high-quality, community-driven content is easier than ever.
  • Discuss: Engage in discussions on strict technical topics or soft skills.
  • Network: Build your personal brand and connect with industry peers.

üìö Knowledge Sharing

  • Articles: Write and read technical articles with code snippets and markdown support.
  • Tags: Follow specific topics like #javascript, #python, #beginners, or #career.
  • Open Source: The platform itself is open source (Forem), reflecting its ethos.

üöÄ Career Growth

  • Jobs: Access a curated job board for developers.
  • Listings: Find mentorship opportunities, events, and products.

Additional Info

DEV is known for its friendly "inclusive" vibe, making it a safe place for beginners to ask questions and experts to share deep dives.

title: Emailnator
description: Generate disposable Gmail-style emails
content:
Emailnator is a simple tool to create temporary email addresses for testing and privacy. No sign-up required, emails expire after 24 hours.

Useful for developers to test forms without spam.

title: Google AI Studio
description: Google‚Äôs web-based environment for experimenting with and building Gemini-powered AI apps.
content: Google AI Studio lets developers prototype, test prompts, and integrate Gemini models into applications.

title: Google Cloud Platform
description: A suite of cloud computing services that provides a generous free tier including App Engine, Cloud Run, and Compute Engine.
content:
Why It's Great

Google Cloud Platform (GCP) offers one of the most developer-friendly free tiers, perfect for hosting everything from static sites to containerized applications and databases.

Key Free Tier Features

üíª Compute & App Hosting

  • Cloud Run: 2 million requests/month, 180,000 vCPU-seconds, 360,000 GB-seconds memory.
  • Compute Engine: 1 e2-micro instance (US regions), 30GB HDD.
  • App Engine: 28 frontend instance hours/day (effectively free for one instance).
  • Kubernetes (GKE): No cluster management fee for one zonal cluster.

üóÑÔ∏è Storage & Database

  • Cloud Storage: 5GB Standard storage.
  • Firestore: 1GB storage, 50k reads/day.
  • BigQuery: 1TB querying/month, 10GB storage.

üõ†Ô∏è Developer Tools

  • Cloud Build: 120 build-minutes/day.
  • Cloud Shell: Free ephemeral Linux shell with 5GB persistent disk.
  • Project IDX: Online VSCode-based development environment (formerly Firebase Studio).

Limitations

  • Egress limits apply (typically 1GB to non-Google destinations).
  • Compute instances are restricted to specific regions (e.g., us-west1, us-central1).

title: Kittl PNG to SVG
description: Best ever PNG to SVG converter. Unlimited usage.
content:
Kittl's PNG to SVG converter is a powerful tool that allows you to convert raster images into vector graphics without any login requirement.

It offers unlimited usage (clearing cache/data resets limits if encountered) and produces high-quality vector results, making it one of the best free converters available.

title: LM Arena
description: A platform to compare large language models through blind, side-by-side evaluations.
content: LM Arena enables unbiased comparison of AI models by letting users vote on responses without knowing the model.

title: Netlify
description: An all-in-one platform for building and deploying fast, secure web applications.
content: Netlify provides CI/CD, serverless functions, and edge services for modern web development.

title: OpenRouter
description: Unified API gateway that gives developers access to hundreds of LLMs and multimodal models through a single endpoint
content:
OpenRouter is a unified API platform that lets you access hundreds (400+) of AI models from many providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta and others) via a single, consistent endpoint. It handles provider routing, fallbacks for higher availability, and exposes model-level pricing so you can choose speed vs. cost trade-offs.

One API, many models ‚Äî call different chat/completion/vision models with the same API shape instead of juggling many provider keys. OpenRouter

Transparent pricing & per-model costs ‚Äî model pricing is shown in the UI/docs so you can compare cost per token or per request. OpenRouter +1

Routing & high availability ‚Äî OpenRouter can route requests to different providers and fall back automatically if a provider is unavailable. OpenRouter

Integrations & ecosystem ‚Äî provider support exists across SDKs, community integrations (examples, Laravel, Vercel/AI SDK provider) and official docs/GitHub.

title: Oracle Cloud
description: Known for the most generous "Always Free" compute offering in the industry, including powerful ARM-based instances.
content:
Why It's Great

Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) stands out with its incredibly generous "Always Free" Arm compute instances, which are powerful enough to run substantial workloads forever, not just for 12 months.

Key Free Tier Features

üíª Compute

  • Arm Ampere A1: Up to 4 OCPUs and 24GB RAM (Always Free).
  • AMD Compute: 2 VMs with 1/8 OCPU and 1GB RAM each.
  • Load Balancer: 1 instance with 10Mbps bandwidth.

üóÑÔ∏è Storage & Networking

  • Block Volume: 200GB total storage (Always Free).
  • Object Storage: 10GB Standard.
  • Outbound Data: 10TB per month (significantly higher than competitors).
  • Databases: 2 Autonomous Databases (20GB each).

üîß Monitoring & Security

  • Monitoring: 500 million ingestion data points, 1 billion retrieval.
  • Notifications: 1 million delivery options per month.

Limitations

  • Arm availability can sometimes be scarce in certain popular regions (e.g., Ashburn).
  • Instances may be reclaimed if deemed idle for long periods (7 days of inactivity).

title: Oxaam
description: Access shared premium accounts for services like Canva Pro, ChatGPT, and more.
content:
Overview

Oxaam provides access to shared premium accounts for various popular services. It bypasses paywalls by sharing session cookies or credentials.

[!CAUTION] Use at your own risk. These are shared accounts. Do not store sensitive data. This service resides in a legal gray area.

Supported Services

  • Kaanvah Pro (Canva Pro)
  • ChatGPT Premium
  • Crunchyroll Premium
  • Perplexity Max
  • Scribd Premium
  • Skillshare Premium
  • TradingView Premium

(Note: Names are often intentionally misspelled on the site to avoid detection)

How to Access

  1. Login: The site asks for login credentials, but NO authentication is enforced. You can enter ANY random email, password, or mobile number to get in.
  2. Canva Pro: The OTP login method is currently broken. Use the Cookie-Editor method provided on the page to access Canva Pro.

[!WARNING] Privacy Alert: Since these are shared accounts, your edits (e.g., in Canva) are visible to other users. Pro Tip: Always delete your data and designs after downloading them. Do not leave personal work in these accounts.

title: Railway
description: A developer-focused cloud platform to deploy apps, databases, and services quickly.
content: Railway enables fast setup and scaling of production-ready applications with minimal configuration.

title: Remove.photos
description: A completely free suite of AI tools for image manipulation including BG remover, cleanup, upscaler, and more. No premium features.
content:
Why It's Great

Remove.photos is a comprehensive utility hub for image editing that is completely free. Unlike many competitors that gate features behind subscriptions, every tool here is accessible without premium tiers.

Features

AI Editing

  • Remove Background: AI automatic cutout.
  • Cleanup Pictures: Remove unwanted objects or defects.
  • Restore Old Photos: Colorize and repair vintage images.
  • Remove Sky: Replace imaginative sky backgrounds.
  • AI Image Expander: Auto-expand images beyond their borders.
    • > [!WARNING] Note: The AI Image Expander may be slow due to queue systems.
  • AI Crop: Intelligent auto-cropping.

Enhancements

  • Image Upscaler: Increase resolution without quality loss.
  • Brighten Image: Enhance image brightness and lighting.
  • Blur Background: Automatically highlight the subject.

Converters & Utilities

  • Image Converter: Convert between formats.
  • Compress Image: Reduce file size efficiently.
  • Text Recognition: Extract text from images (OCR).
  • Add White Background: Quick product photo prep.

Pricing

  • 100% Free: No hidden costs or premium lockouts.

title: Render
description: A unified cloud platform for deploying web apps, APIs, databases, and background jobs.
content: Render simplifies backend and full-stack deployments with automatic scaling and managed infrastructure.

title: Replit
description: An online IDE and cloud development environment for building and deploying applications.
content: Replit allows developers to code, collaborate, and deploy directly from the browser without local setup.

title: SaveWeb2Zip
description: Download entire websites or landing pages as a ZIP archive with all assets (HTML, CSS, JS, Images, Fonts).
content:
Overview

SaveWeb2Zip is a powerful online tool that allows you to download and save complete websites or specific landing pages. It packages all necessary assets into a single ZIP file, making it easy to archive or analyze web pages offline.

Key Features

  • Complete Asset Download: Captures HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Images, and Fonts.
  • Structure Preservation: Maintains the original directory structure of the website.
  • Mobile Version: Option to specifically copy the mobile version of a site.
  • Asset Renaming: Automatically handles asset renaming for consistent local paths.
  • Simplified Download: One-click process to archive landing pages or full sites.
  • Free to Use: Download any page absolutely for free.

How it Works

  1. Enter the URL of the webpage you want to save.
  2. Select options (Rename assets, Copy mobile version, etc.).
  3. Click Save to generate the archive.
  4. Download the ZIP file containing all site files.

title: SSYouTube
description: Download YouTube videos in max quality. Free & no ads.
content:
SSYouTube is one of the best free online YouTube video downloaders available. It allows you to effortlessly download multimedia in the maximum possible quality.

Features:

  • Max Quality: Retains original video quality.
  • No Ads: Clean experience with minimal redirects (only one).
  • Unlimited & Free: No hidden costs or limits.

Note: For extremely large files or playlists where online tools might time out, we recommend using yt-dlp, an open-source command-line tool.

title: Temp Mail
description: A disposable email service for quick sign-ups and privacy protection.
content: Temp Mail provides temporary email addresses to avoid spam and protect personal inboxes.

title: ToolFK
description: A massive all-in-one developer toolbox featuring compilers, converters, network utilities, and encryption tools.
content:
Why It's Great

ToolFK is a comprehensive Swiss Army knife for developers. It offers a vast array of free online tools ranging from code compilation to complex file conversions, all in one place.

Key Features

üíª Online Compilers

Run code instantly in your browser without any setup.

  • Languages: C, C++, Java, Python, PHP, Go, Rust, Swift, Ruby, Lua, and more.
  • Execution: Fast compilation and execution with standard input/output support.

üõ†Ô∏è Developer Utilities

  • JSON Editor: Validate, format, and convert JSON (to CSV, XML, Java, C#).
  • SQL Tools: SQL Formatter and Online SQL Schema Designer.
  • Regex Tester: Test and generate regular expressions for multiple languages.
  • Cron Evaluator: Generate and test Linux crontab expressions.
  • Diff Tool: Compare text or code snippets for differences.

üîê Security & Encryption

  • Obfuscators: Protect JS, Python, PHP, and Java code.
  • Encryption: MD5, SHA, AES, DES text encryption.
  • Base64: Advanced encoding/decoding for text, files, images, and audio/video.

üåê Network & Web

  • DNS & Port Checker: Verify DNS records and check open ports.
  • IP Lookup: Detailed IP address information.
  • HTTP Simulator: Test API requests (GET/POST) seamlessly.
  • cURL Converter: Convert cURL commands to Python, Node.js, Ansible, etc.

üìÇ File Converters

  • PDF Tools: Convert PDF to Word, Excel, PPT, Image, and vice versa.
  • Image Tools: Compress, resize, and convert images (PNG/JPG/WEBP/SVG).

Pricing

  • 100% Free: All tools are available for free online use.

title: Unmute.sh
description: Speak to an AI using Kyutai's new low-latency open-source speech-to-text and text-to-speech models.
content:
Overview

Unmute.sh is a demo platform by Kyutai showcasing their low-latency open-source audio foundation models. It enables real-time, natural spoken conversations with AI.

Features

  • Real-time Interaction: Extremely low latency speech processing.
  • End-to-End Audio: Speech-to-text and text-to-speech integration.
  • Open Source: Based on Kyutai's open research and models.
  • Kyutai Labs: Developed by the Kyutai research lab.

title: Unsplash API
description: The most powerful free image API associated with the world's largest free image library.
content:
Why It's Great

The Unsplash API provides access to the world's most generous community of photographers. It's the engine behind thousands of apps, providing high-quality, royalty-free images for:

  • Poster Apps: Create stunning print-on-demand products.
  • Photo Editors: Offer a vast library of stock photos to users.
  • Wallpaper Apps: Access millions of high-res backgrounds.
  • UI Mockups: Populate your designs with beautiful, real-world imagery.

Quick Start

  1. Create Account: Sign up at unsplash.com/developers.
  2. Get API Key: Create a new application to get your Access Key.
  3. Fetch Photos: Use simple HTTP requests.

Example (JavaScript)

const url = 'https://api.unsplash.com/photos/random?client_id=YOUR_ACCESS_KEY';

async function fetchImage() {
    try {
        const response = await fetch(url);
        const data = await response.json();
        
        console.log('Image URL:', data.urls.regular);
        console.log('Photographer:', data.user.name);
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching image:', error);
    }
}

fetchImage();

Example (HTTP)

GET /search/photos?query=nature
Host: api.unsplash.com
Authorization: Client-ID YOUR_ACCESS_KEY

The API returns a JSON response containing image URLs (raw, full, regular, small), photographer details, and download links.

title: Vercel
description: A frontend cloud platform for building, deploying, and scaling modern web applications.
content: Vercel enables seamless deployment of React, Next.js, and static sites with global edge infrastructure.

title: Yupp AI
description: A unified interface to compare and use multiple AI models in one place.
content: Yupp AI allows users to test prompts across different AI models and evaluate outputs side by side.
